author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Mother filmed tying boy to railings as punishment while pinning his head down with her foot
text:
Police are on the hunt for this woman for tying her son to a railing (Picture: Viral Press) Police in Bangkok are hunting a mother who was filmed tying her son to railings and pinning his head down with her foot as punishment.
The boy can be heard shouting ‘I can’t breathe, I can’t breathe’ during the ordeal at a food market in Bangkok, Thailand.
What this kitten does while feeding makes him even more adorable She refuses to let go and continues to tie him up while people look on, too afraid to help.
The woman who filmed it passed the footage to Thai authorities who published it to track down the mother.
Corporal Rangsan Namsang said: ‘The mother has a bad heart. She was seen at the entrance to the temple near the Park Kret market.

‘She does something really bad. Is this really what a mum should do? The only way the lady could help was by taking the video and sharing it.
‘Listen to the kid, he says “I cannot breathe, I cannot breath”. The woman can help the kid a little by taking picture, but they did not have the chance to get involved.

The boy is understood to have been released a short time later by the mother after she was satisfied with the punishment.
Corporal Namsang said that the authorities had been alerted to the footage and are likely to to start an investigation to trace the mother.
